Class model.CarTransporter

java.lang.Object
model.AbstractMovable
model.Vehicle
model.TrailerTruck
model.CarTransporter
All Implemented Interfaces:
model.Movable
public class model.CarTransporter extends model.TrailerTruck
model.CarTransporter is used to initialize a model.CarTransporter-object. A model.CarTransporter object contains all attributes from the super-class Truck, see model.TrailerTruck. A model.CarTransporter object is initialized with position along the x- and y- coordinates. The other characteristics are set by default. A model.CarTransporter can load and transport model.Car objects, see model.Car.

      public boolean getIsRampUp()
      getRampUp() returns the current state of the ramp.
      Returns:

    • loadCar

      public void loadCar(model.Car car)
      loadCar() loads a car to a car-transporter object if the ramp is down, the weight of the load does not exceed a max value, the car is close enough to the transporter and the car-transporter-trailer is not full. Also sets the cars coordinates to that of the car-transporter.
      Parameters:
      car - The car that will be loaded.

    • unLoadCar

      public void unLoadCar()
      unLoadCar() unloads a car from a car-transporter object and sets its coordinates to appropriate values.

    • notFullTrailer

      public boolean notFullTrailer()
      notFullTrailer() checks whether the car-transporters's load holds the maximum number of cars or not.
      Returns:
      True if the trailer is not full otherwise false.

    • isTrailerMovable

      public boolean isTrailerMovable()
      isTrailerMovable checks if the trailer is movable by checking whether the ramp is up.
      Specified by:
      isTrailerMovable in class model.TrailerTruck
      Returns:
      true if the ramp is up.

    • move

      public void move()
      move() will move the car-transporter in the current direction it is facing based on its current speed and will update the position and direction of all cars currently loaded on the car-transporter.
      Specified by:

    • getCarLoad

      public Deque<model.Car> getCarLoad()
